inclusion.criterion: ITP patients received triple therapy or steroids only more than 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ITP patients received triple therapy or steroids only more than 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: All ITP patient less than 18 years old or treated with other regimens except triple therapy or steroids
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: ITP patients with known viral hepatitis B & C infection before triple therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection, but direct antiviral drugs were added to his treatment 6 months ago. He is on IFN (100 mg/week) plus RBV (400 mg/day) combination therapy for the past 9 months.
